subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Shooting (Sport)
Skiing
Alpine Skiing
lead_paragraph: Right before Bode Miller’s run, the first classic downhill of the World Cup season was canceled Saturday in Val Gardena, Italy, because of strong wind.
snippet: Right before Bode Miller’s run, the first classic downhill of the World Cup season was canceled Saturday in Val Gardena, Italy, because of strong wind.
